title: Lily Allen collapsed at Glastonbury | The
text:
BRITISH singer Lily Allen collapsed in a VIP area at Glastonbury music festival following a wild weekend of partying.
The Sun ran shocking pictures of the stricken 30-year-old lying unconscious in a field as medics ran to her aid about 9pm last Saturday.
“She was out of it, she didn’t know where she was. Her friends were saying, ‘You all right?’ and trying to give her water,” a witness said.
“Her eyes were rolling and her chin was moving from side to side, chewing constantly.” Singer Lily Allen poses for a selfie with fans backstage at the Wireless Festival. Picture: Joel Ryan/Invision/AP Source: AP
Lily Allen models a new look at the Wireless Festival at Finsbury Park on July 3. Picture: Tim P. Whitby/Getty Images Source: Getty Images
The mother-of-two has admitted using Ketamine, a horse tranquilliser, and cocaine in the past, even confessing she first took drugs at the age of 13 while at Glastonbury.
Earlier in the night, the Not Fair singer was seen partying with artists Big Narstie and DJ Target at the Wow stage before they performed.
According to a witness, the Smile hit maker headed outside for fresh air and sat on the grass before collapsing.
Lily Allen in costume (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4g9RTzQMet/embed .)
Worried friends picked her up and lay her down on the back seat of a car, calling the performer’s husband, Sam Cooper, who was elsewhere at the festival.
“She was in the recovery position and two security guys were talking to her. It looked like they were trying to get people away from her. She looked in a bad way, she was pretty f****d,” an onlooker said.
“Before that I saw her staggering around looking haggard and out of it.”
Causing trouble (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4kflLIwMZS/embed .)
Allen was not taken to hospital. The cause of her collapse is unclear.
The artist’s rep told The Sun : “She is totally fine and had a great Glastonbury.”
While the LDN singer has not publicly commented on her collapse, she shared numerous videos and photos of her wild partying at Glastonbury, incuding burning a “F**k Kanye” flag and dressing up in a penis costume.
Flag burning (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4kfAG0wMYV/embed .)
Allen has spoken in the past of her love of drugs, insisting she was not ashamed of her partying ways.
“I think the way I behave is normal for someone my age and in my situation,” the then 24-year-old GQ magazine in 2009.
“I know a lot of guys in bands who go to awards ceremonies and get into the same sort of states that I get myself into, and that’s not negatively reported on. So it feels kind of unjust.
“I think as long as you’re not being malicious and you’re not hurting people then you should not be ashamed of what you do. I’ve taken drugs. I found them and find them fun and I don’t think I’m a bad person because of it.”
Wedding ... British singer Lily Allen and Sam Cooper at their wedding ceremony in 2011. Picture: AP Photo/Ben Birchall/PA Source: AP
However the singer promised to clean up her act after marrying Cooper in 2011.
The couple has two daughters, Ethel Mary and Marnie Rose.
Originally published as Lily Allen’s shock Glastonbury collapse
